objects.text:
• Premium gold-plated finish for lasting shine
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Hypoallergenic materials for sensitive ears

product_details.name: Elegant Pearl Wave Gold-Plated Hoop Earrings - Timeless Luxury
product_details.description:
• Premium gold-plated finish for lasting shine and durability
• Double row of delicate pearl embellishments
• Sophisticated curved wave design for modern elegance
• Secure post back closure for comfortable wear
• Perfect size for both casual and formal occasions
• Hypoallergenic materials suitable for sensitive ears
• Handcrafted with attention to detail
• Versatile style that complements any outfit
• Comes in a matching pair
• Ideal gift for special occasions

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and sophisticated layout, highlighting a luxurious jewelry item. The left half is used for textual content, aligning various text elements vertically. The "heading" text layer uses a classic serif font in dark grey, establishing a premium tone. Below it, the "subheading" layer stands out in a bold golden color, capturing immediate attention. Supporting details are listed using the "description" layer in a subtle grey font. The price is emphasized in the "price" layer using a futuristic display font in gold. A bold call-to-action button comprises "cta_background" as a dark rectangle with contrasting white text labeled "cta". The right half features a product image ("product_image") depicting a pair of wavy, gold-plated pearl earrings. The background includes a soft gradient, minimalist golden line art, abstract circles, and a faint dark overlay on the right that enhances contrast for the product image.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream Gradient Background: #F5EFE6 to #FAF3E0  
- Accents/Highlights: #D4AF37, #E6C66E  
- Text: #333333 (heading), #D4AF37 (subheading & price), #555555 (description), #FFFFFF (CTA text)  
- Button Background: #333333  
- Overlay Accent: #1A1A1A (5% opacity)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of luxurious, gold-toned earrings accented with rows of small pearl-like beads. The primary color, a rich metallic gold (#D4AF37), dominates the design, exuding elegance and prominence. Pearlescent white (#F8F8FF) beads add a delicate contrast, enhancing the texture and refined appeal. A subtle shadow in dark brown (#5A4A3C) helps convey depth and curvature in the gold surface. The colors are beautifully balanced—gold reflecting light warmly, while the pearls soften the overall aesthetic. For an ad banner, a palette of White (#FFFFFF), Gold (#D4AF37), Soft Pearl (#F8F8FF), and Neutral Beige (#ECE6DA) will highlight the product's luxury.
